description:
Goals, checklists, tasks, repetitive tasks, calendar and 24/7 time tracking. The main feature of this app is goals. Tap a goal to start a timer with the remaining time for that goal. Timer is running all the time, 24/7, even for sleep or breakfast. There is no stop option! To stop the current goal, you have to start the next one. You can add a checklist for goals. Useful for morning/evening routines, work, exercises, etc. This way I control my time and don't forget anything. Try to adapt it to your life. Best regards,
Ivan
